FuncDef:
The version command specifies a global RIP version.
The undo version command restores the default version. The version command specifies a global RIP version. The undo version command restores the default version. By default, the RIP version is RIP-1.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates a RIP version.
The value can be 1 or 2.

ExtraInfo:
If the RIP version number is set to 1, only RIP-1 packets are sent and accepted.
If RIP version 2 is specified, RIP-2 packets are sent in multicast mode, and RIP-2 packets in multicast or broadcast mode are accepted.
